trans-unit.source: Provides an implementation of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService"></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: 提供的實作<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService"></xref>介面。

trans-unit.source: A BasicDesignerLoader is a complete implementation of a designer loader without anything relating to a persistence format.
trans-unit.target: BasicDesignerLoader 是沒有任何項目與相關的持續性格式的設計工具載入器的完整實作。

trans-unit.source: A BasicDesignerLoader does not dictate either a text or binary persistence, but it does support the following features: - Multiple load dependencies.
trans-unit.target: BasicDesignerLoader 不會指定文字或二進位的持續性，但支援下列功能:-有多個載入的相依性。

trans-unit.source: - Tracking changes within the designer.
trans-unit.target: 在設計工具中，變更追蹤。

trans-unit.source: - Deferred idle-time reloading.
trans-unit.target: -延後重新載入閒置時間。

trans-unit.source: A BasicDesignerLoader adds two kinds of services to the designer host’s service container: replaceable services and irreplaceable services.
trans-unit.target: BasicDesignerLoader 將兩種類型的服務加入至設計工具主應用程式服務容器︰ 可取代的服務和服務無法取代。

trans-unit.source: You can replace a replaceable service by changing the value of the protected <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.LoaderHost%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以變更受保護的值來取代可取代服務<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.LoaderHost%2A>屬性。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.LoaderHost%2A>

trans-unit.source: You cannot replace irreplaceable services because their implementations depend on each other.
trans-unit.target: 您不能取代無法取代的服務，因為他們實作彼此相依。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the services that are provided by default.
trans-unit.target: 下表描述的服務所提供的預設值。

trans-unit.source: |Default Service|Description| |---------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService>|Allows objects to request that the designer reload itself when it is idle.
trans-unit.target: |預設服務 |描述 | |---------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService>|可讓物件要求設計工具載入本身閒置時。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService>

trans-unit.source: This is a replaceable service.| |<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager>|Used to serialize and deserialize objects.
trans-unit.target: 這是可取代的服務。 | |<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager>|用來序列化和還原序列化的物件。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager>

trans-unit.source: The serialization manager is added as a service so objects that need to perform serialization can utilize any serialization providers that were added to the serialization manager.
trans-unit.target: 序列化管理員會加入做為服務，因此需要執行序列化的物件可以使用任何序列化提供者加入序列化管理員。

trans-unit.source: This is an irreplaceable service.|
trans-unit.target: 這是無法取代的服務。 |

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Starts the loading process.
trans-unit.target: 啟動載入程序。

trans-unit.source: This is an implementation of the abstract <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 這是實作抽象的<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You do not need to override this method in your own class.
trans-unit.target: 您不需要您自己的類別中置換此方法。

trans-unit.source: The BeginLoad method performs the following actions: - It verifies that the design surface has not already loaded.
trans-unit.target: BeginLoad 方法用來執行下列動作:-它會確認，在設計介面是否尚未載入。

trans-unit.source: - On the first call, it adds relevant services and calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Initialize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: -在第一次呼叫時，它會將相關的服務和呼叫<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Initialize%2A>方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Initialize%2A>

trans-unit.source: - It calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnBeginLoad%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.PerformLoad%2A>, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnEndLoad%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: -它會呼叫<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnBeginLoad%2A>， <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.PerformLoad%2A>，和<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnEndLoad%2A>方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnEndLoad%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.PerformLoad%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnBeginLoad%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the designer loader service has not been removed from the service container, BeginLoad will call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerLoaderService%23AddLoadDependency%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerLoaderService%23DependentLoadComplete%2A> methods instead of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnBeginLoad%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnEndLoad%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 如果設計工具載入器服務尚未從服務容器中移除，會呼叫 BeginLoad<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerLoaderService%23AddLoadDependency%2A>和<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerLoaderService%23DependentLoadComplete%2A>方法，而非<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnBeginLoad%2A>和<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnEndLoad%2A>方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnEndLoad%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnBeginLoad%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerLoaderService%23DependentLoadComplete%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerLoaderService%23AddLoadDependency%2A>

trans-unit.source: In this situation, it is the responsibility of the designer loader service to call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnBeginLoad%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnEndLoad%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，必須負責呼叫<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnBeginLoad%2A>和<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnEndLoad%2A>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnEndLoad%2A></xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnBeginLoad%2A>的設計工具載入器服務

trans-unit.source: The designer loader host to load.
trans-unit.target: 載入設計工具載入器主應用程式。

trans-unit.source: host is .
trans-unit.target: hostis .

trans-unit.source: The designer is already loaded, or BeginLoad has been called with a different designer loader host.
trans-unit.target: 在設計工具已經載入，或已使用不同的設計工具載入器主機呼叫 BeginLoad。

trans-unit.source: host has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: host已被處置。

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources used by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 所使用的資源釋出<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Calling the Dispose method does not flush changes to the designer loader.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 Dispose 方法不會請勿清除變更至設計工具載入器。

trans-unit.source: If you want changes to be saved, call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Flush%2A> before calling Dispose.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要儲存變更時，呼叫<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Flush%2A>之前呼叫 Dispose。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Flush%2A>

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader>.
trans-unit.target: 當您完成使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader>呼叫 Dispose

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Dispose 方法會使<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader>中無法使用的狀態。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫 Dispose 之後，您必須釋放所有參考<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader>讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體的<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader>所佔用。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[實作 Dispose 方法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 永遠呼叫 Dispose 之後，再放開您的最後一個參考至<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader>。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它所使用的資源將不會釋放直到記憶體回收行程呼叫<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader>物件的`Finalize`方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader>

trans-unit.source: Enables or disables component notification with the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerLoader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 啟用或停用元件通知<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerLoader"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to enable component notification by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerLoader"></xref>; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to disable component notification by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerLoader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要啟用由元件通知<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerLoader"> </xref>;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>停用元件通知由<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerLoader"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the component notification was enabled prior to this call; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果在這個呼叫; 之前已啟用的元件通知否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Flushes pending changes to the designer loader.
trans-unit.target: 排清暫止的變更設計工具載入器。

trans-unit.source: If the designer loader has not been loaded or has not been marked as modified, the Flush method returns immediately.
trans-unit.target: 如果尚未載入設計工具載入器，或未標示為已修改，排清方法會立即傳回。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, Flush asks the serialization manager to create a serialization session and then calls <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.PerformFlush%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 否則，排清要求的序列化管理員建立的序列化工作階段，然後再呼叫 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.PerformFlush%2A>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.PerformFlush%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the requested service.
trans-unit.target: 取得所要求的服務。

trans-unit.source: GetService is a helper method that allows classes deriving from <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader> to access services offered by the designer loader host.
trans-unit.target: GetService 是 helper 方法，可讓類別衍生自<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader>來存取設計工具載入器主機所提供的服務。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the service.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>的服務。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The requested service, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the requested service cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: 所要求的服務，或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果找不到所要求的服務。

trans-unit.source: Initializes services.
trans-unit.target: 初始化服務。

trans-unit.source: The Initialize method is called the first time <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A> is invoked.
trans-unit.target: Initialize 方法會呼叫第一次<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A>叫用。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can add any services necessary to the designer loader host at this time.
trans-unit.target: 此時，您可以加入至設計工具載入器主機所需的任何服務。

trans-unit.source: The base implementation adds services that <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader> provides, so after calling the base implementation you may replace existing services.
trans-unit.target: 基底實作可讓您新增服務的<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader>提供，因此在呼叫基底實作之後，您可以取代現有的服務。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader>

trans-unit.source: You must remove any custom services you add here by overriding <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Dispose%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 您必須先移除任何自訂的服務，藉由覆寫<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Dispose%2A>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Dispose%2A>此處新增

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost"></xref> has not been initialized.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost"> </xref>尚未初始化。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost"></xref> has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost"> </xref>已經過處置。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the designer should be reloaded.
trans-unit.target: 指出是否應重新載入設計工具。

trans-unit.source: The IsReloadNeeded method is used by some designer loaders to optimize reloading.
trans-unit.target: IsReloadNeeded 方法正由某些設計工具載入器最佳化重新載入。

trans-unit.source: This method can be overridden if your designer loader supports intelligent reloading.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的設計工具載入器支援智慧重新載入，就可以覆寫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Some designer loaders can detect changes made to their underlying document and determine if a reload of the designer is actually necessary.
trans-unit.target: 某些設計工具載入器可以偵測其基礎的文件所做的變更，並判斷是否確實需要重新載入設計工具。

trans-unit.source: If not, they should return `false` from this method.
trans-unit.target: 如果不是，它們應該傳回`false`從這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation always returns `true`, indicating that any call to <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Reload%2A> will succeed.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作一定會傳回`true`，指出任何呼叫至<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Reload%2A>會成功。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Reload%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the designer should be reloaded; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果應重新載入設計工具;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作一定會傳回<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the loader host.
trans-unit.target: 取得載入器主應用程式。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the loader host that was given to this designer loader.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳回與這個設計工具載入器載入器主應用程式。

trans-unit.source: This can be `null` if <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A> has not been called yet, or if this designer loader has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 這可以是`null`如果<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A>尚未呼叫，或如果此設計工具載入器已被處置。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost"></xref> that was passed to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad*> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost"> </xref>傳遞給<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad*>方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost"></xref> has not been initialized.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost"> </xref>尚未初始化。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost"></xref> has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost"> </xref>已經過處置。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the designer loader is loading the design surface.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出設計工具載入器是否正在載入設計介面。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader> class provides the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService>, which supports load dependencies.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader>類別提供<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService>，它支援載入相依性。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader>

trans-unit.source: This property takes load dependencies into account and will return `true` if there are any outstanding load dependencies.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性會接受載入相依性納入考量，並將傳回`true`如果有任何未完成的載入相依性。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the designer loader is currently loading the design surface; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果設計工具載入器目前正在載入設計介面。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the designer has been modified.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否已修改設計工具。

trans-unit.source: Determines if the designer loader has detected that the designer has been modified.
trans-unit.target: 決定是否設計工具載入器偵測到已修改的設計工具。

trans-unit.source: If this property is `true` when the designer loader’s <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Flush%2A> method is called, the designer loader will call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.PerformFlush%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性是`true`當設計工具載入器<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Flush%2A>呼叫方法時，設計工具載入器會呼叫<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.PerformFlush%2A>方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.PerformFlush%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Flush%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the designer has been modified; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>,
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已修改設計工具;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>，

trans-unit.source: Notifies the designer loader that loading is about to begin.
trans-unit.target: 通知設計工具載入器載入即將開始。

trans-unit.source: The OnBeginLoad method is invoked to start the loading process.
trans-unit.target: OnBeginLoad 方法會叫用來啟動載入程序。

trans-unit.source: You should perform any necessary initialization for loading at this time.
trans-unit.target: 目前載入的您應該執行任何必要的初始化。

trans-unit.source: This method should not be used to perform the actual load.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不應該用於執行實際的負載。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation disables change notifications and sets up the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader> for loading.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作會停用變更通知，並設定<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader>載入。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader>

trans-unit.source: If you implement <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService> to provide dependent load support, you should call OnBeginLoad when the first dependent load occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果您實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService>以提供相依負載支援，您應該呼叫 OnBeginLoad 時的第一個相依的載入，就會發生。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService>

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnEndLoad%2A> method after the last call to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerLoaderService%23DependentLoadComplete%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnEndLoad%2A>方法之後，最後呼叫<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerLoaderService%23DependentLoadComplete%2A>方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerLoaderService%23DependentLoadComplete%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnEndLoad%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader> implements <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService> and does this for you.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader>實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService>並會為您進行。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService> is not available when <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A> is called, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A> will directly call OnBeginLoad.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService>時不可以使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A>呼叫時，<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A>會直接呼叫 OnBeginLoad。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService>

trans-unit.source: If you provide your own loader service, or if you choose not to provide a loader service, you are responsible for calling this method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您提供您自己的載入器服務，或您選擇不提供載入器服務，您必須負責呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A> method will automatically call this, either indirectly by calling <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerLoaderService%23AddLoadDependency%2A> if <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService> is available, or directly if it is not.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A>方法將會自動呼叫這個，間接藉由呼叫<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerLoaderService%23AddLoadDependency%2A>如果<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService>可用，或直接如果不是。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerLoaderService%23AddLoadDependency%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A>

trans-unit.source: Notifies the designer loader that unloading is about to begin.
trans-unit.target: 通知設計工具載入器，卸載即將開始。

trans-unit.source: The OnBeginUnload method is invoked when the designer loader is about to unload the document.
trans-unit.target: 設計工具載入器即將卸載文件時，會叫用 OnBeginUnload 方法。

trans-unit.source: The document may be unloaded in preparation for reloading, or if the document failed to load.
trans-unit.target: 文件可能會卸載，以準備進行重新載入，或如果無法載入文件。

trans-unit.source: If you added document-specific services in <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnBeginLoad%2A> or <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnEndLoad%2A>, remove them here.
trans-unit.target: 如果您加入在特定文件 services<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnBeginLoad%2A>或<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnEndLoad%2A>，這裡加以移除。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnEndLoad%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnBeginLoad%2A>

trans-unit.source: Notifies the designer loader that loading is complete.
trans-unit.target: 通知設計工具載入器載入已完成。

trans-unit.source: The OnEndLoad method is invoked when loading is finished.
trans-unit.target: 當完成載入時，會叫用 OnEndLoad 方法。

trans-unit.source: It is always called, even if an exception is thrown during loading.
trans-unit.target: 它會一律呼叫，即使在載入期間擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The value of `successful` will be set to `true` if the load succeeded, or `false` if a fatal error occurred.
trans-unit.target: 值`successful`會設定為`true`如果載入成功，或`false`如果發生嚴重錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The `errors` collection will contain objects that were reported as errors.
trans-unit.target: `errors`集合會包含已回報為錯誤的物件。

trans-unit.source: Usually, these objects are exceptions.
trans-unit.target: 通常，這些物件是例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If you implement <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService> to provide dependent load support, you should call the OnEndLoad method after the last call to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerLoaderService%23DependentLoadComplete%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService>以提供相依負載支援，您應該在上次呼叫之後呼叫 OnEndLoad 方法<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerLoaderService%23DependentLoadComplete%2A>方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerLoaderService%23DependentLoadComplete%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService>

trans-unit.source: By default, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader> implements <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService> and does this for you.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader>實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService>並會為您進行。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService> is not available when <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A> is called, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A> will directly call OnEndLoad after calling <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.PerformLoad%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService>時不可以使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A>呼叫時，<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A>會直接呼叫之後呼叫<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.PerformLoad%2A>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.PerformLoad%2A> OnEndLoad</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService>

trans-unit.source: This method should be called by the designer loader service when all dependent loads have been completed.
trans-unit.target: 完成所有相依的負載，應該呼叫這個方法由設計工具載入器服務。

trans-unit.source: This stops the loading process that was initiated by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這會停止載入程序所起始的<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A>方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you provide your own loader service, or if you choose not to provide a loader service, you are responsible for calling this method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您提供您自己的載入器服務，或您選擇不提供載入器服務，您必須負責呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A> method will automatically call this, either indirectly by calling the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerLoaderService%23DependentLoadComplete%2A> method if <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService> is available, or directly if it is not.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A>方法將會自動呼叫這個，間接藉由呼叫<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerLoaderService%23DependentLoadComplete%2A>方法如果<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService>可用，或直接如果不是。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerLoaderService%23DependentLoadComplete%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the load completed successfully; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果載入成功。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> containing objects (usually exceptions) that were reported as errors.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>包含已回報為錯誤的物件 （通常是例外狀況）。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost"></xref> has not been initialized.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost"> </xref>尚未初始化。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost"></xref> has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost"> </xref>已經過處置。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the designer loader that the state of the document is about to be modified.
trans-unit.target: 通知設計工具載入器即將修改文件的狀態。

trans-unit.source: The OnModifying method is called in response to a component changing, adding, or removing event which indicates that the designer is about to be modified.
trans-unit.target: OnModifying 方法呼叫元件不斷加入，或移除事件表示，在設計工具是即將修改。

trans-unit.source: You can implement source code control by overriding this method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由覆寫這個方法實作原始程式碼控制。

trans-unit.source: A call to OnModifying does not mean that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Modified%2A> property will later be set to `true`; it merely indicates an intention to do so.
trans-unit.target: OnModifying 呼叫並不表示<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Modified%2A>稍後將屬性設定為`true`; 它只是表示並未</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Modified%2A>

trans-unit.source: Flushes all changes to the designer.
trans-unit.target: 設計工具，排清所有變更。

trans-unit.source: The PerformFlush method is invoked when the designer loader needs to flush to persistence any changes made to the designers.
trans-unit.target: 當設計工具載入器需要排清到持續性設計工具所做的變更時，會叫用 PerformFlush 方法。

trans-unit.source: It is invoked in response to a call to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Flush%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 它會叫用呼叫的回應<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Flush%2A>方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Flush%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager"></xref> to use for persisting the state of loaded designers.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager"> </xref>来用來保存載入設計工具的狀態。

trans-unit.source: Loads a designer from persistence.
trans-unit.target: 從持續性載入設計工具。

trans-unit.source: The PerformLoad method is invoked when the designer loader needs to load its state.
trans-unit.target: 在設計工具載入器需要載入其狀態時，會叫用 PerformLoad 方法。

trans-unit.source: PerformLoad is called before the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnBeginLoad%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 之前，會呼叫 performLoad<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnBeginLoad%2A>方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnBeginLoad%2A>

trans-unit.source: You must implement this method to load the designer contents.
trans-unit.target: 您必須實作這個方法來載入設計工具的內容。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager"></xref> to use for loading state for the designers.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager"> </xref>来用於設計工具載入狀態。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the property provider for the serialization manager being used by the loader.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定載入器正在使用的序列化管理員的屬性提供者。

trans-unit.source: The serialization manager provides a `Properties` property on its primary interface that can be read by serializers to customize their serialization to specific needs.
trans-unit.target: 提供的序列化管理員`Properties`自訂其特殊需要序列化的序列化程式可以讀取其主要介面上的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The properties that are examined by the serializers vary depending on the type of serializer used.
trans-unit.target: 會檢查序列化的屬性需視使用的序列化程式類型而有所不同。

trans-unit.source: An object whose properties are to be provided to the serialization manager.
trans-unit.target: 物件，其屬性會提供加入序列化管理員。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost"></xref> has not been initialized.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost"> </xref>尚未初始化。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether a reload has been queued.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否已加入佇列重新載入。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if a call to <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Reload*> has queued a reload request; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果呼叫<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Reload*>已放入佇列重新載入要求，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Reload*>

trans-unit.source: Reports errors that occurred while flushing changes.
trans-unit.target: 清除變更時發生的錯誤報告。

trans-unit.source: The ReportFlushErrors method is called during <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Flush%2A> if one or more errors occurred while flushing changes.
trans-unit.target: ReportFlushErrors 方法期間會呼叫<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Flush%2A>如果清除變更時發生一個或多個錯誤。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Flush%2A>

trans-unit.source: The values in the `errors` collection can be exceptions or objects with <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A> values that describe the error.
trans-unit.target: 中的值`errors`例外狀況或物件，可以是集合<xref:System.Object.ToString%2A>描述錯誤的值。</xref:System.Object.ToString%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of ReportFlushErrors raises the last exception in the collection.
trans-unit.target: ReportFlushErrors 的預設實作會引發在集合中的最後一個例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> containing error objects, usually exceptions.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>包含錯誤物件，通常是例外狀況。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: One or more errors occurred while flushing changes.
trans-unit.target: 清除變更時發生一個或多個錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Sets the full class name of the base component.
trans-unit.target: 設定基底元件的完整類別名稱。

trans-unit.source: The SetBaseComponentClassName method should be called during loading to establish the full name of the component a designer is designing.
trans-unit.target: SetBaseComponentClassName 方法應該呼叫期間建立的元件設計工具設計的完整名稱載入。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the full name of the component to be designed.
trans-unit.target: 字串，表示設計元件的完整名稱。

trans-unit.source: name is .
trans-unit.target: nameis .

trans-unit.source: Registers an external component as part of the load process managed by <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 外部元件註冊為受在載入程序的一部分<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService.AddLoadDependency%2A> method once for each external object participating in the load process.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService.AddLoadDependency%2A>方法一次載入處理序中參與的每個外部物件。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService.AddLoadDependency%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService.DependentLoadComplete%2A> method is called when the work of the load process is done.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService.DependentLoadComplete%2A>方法在載入程序的工作完成時呼叫。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService.DependentLoadComplete%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost"></xref> has not been initialized.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost"> </xref>尚未初始化。

trans-unit.source: Signals that a dependent load has finished.
trans-unit.target: 相依的載入已完成的信號。

trans-unit.source: The IDesignerLoaderService.DependentLoadComplete method is called to signal that a dependent loading operation has completed.
trans-unit.target: IDesignerLoaderService.DependentLoadComplete 方法呼叫來表示相依的載入作業已完成。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService.DependentLoadComplete%2A> method once for every process that was registered by calling the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService.AddLoadDependency%2A> method, which has already completed.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService.DependentLoadComplete%2A>方法一次註冊藉由呼叫每個處理序<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService.AddLoadDependency%2A>方法，已完成。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService.AddLoadDependency%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService.DependentLoadComplete%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the dependent load succeeds, the caller sets the `successful` parameter to `true` and passes either an empty collection or `null` to the `errorCollection` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果相依載入成功，呼叫端`successful`參數`true`並傳遞空集合或`null`至`errorCollection`參數。

trans-unit.source: If the dependent load encounters errors, the caller sets the `successful` parameter to `false` and passes a collection of exceptions that indicate the reason or reasons for failure to the `errorCollection` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端相依載入發生問題，設定`successful`參數`false`，並將指出的原因或失敗的原因的例外狀況的集合傳遞`errorCollection`參數。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to load successfully; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>已成功; 載入否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> containing errors that occurred during the load.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>包含載入期間，發生的錯誤。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: No load dependencies have been added by <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerLoaderService%23AddLoadDependency%2A>, or the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost"></xref> has not been initialized.
trans-unit.target: 沒有載入相依性已藉由加入<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerLoaderService%23AddLoadDependency%2A>，或<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost"></xref>尚未初始化。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost"></xref> has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost"> </xref>已經過處置。

trans-unit.source: Reloads the design document.
trans-unit.target: 重新載入設計文件。

trans-unit.source: Any object can call the IDesignerLoaderService.Reload method to request that the loader reload the design document.
trans-unit.target: 任何物件可以呼叫 IDesignerLoaderService.Reload 方法，以要求載入器重新載入設計文件。

trans-unit.source: If the loader supports reloading and complies with the reload, the designer loader can return `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果載入器支援重新載入，而且遵守重新載入，設計工具載入器可以傳回`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it returns `false`, indicating that the reload will not occur.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它會傳回`false`，表示不會發生重新載入。

trans-unit.source: Callers cannot rely on the reload happening immediately; the designer loader can schedule this for some other time, or it can try to reload the designer at once.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端不能依賴立即; 發生重新載入設計工具載入器可以將這項安排其他時間，或它可以再試一次重新載入設計工具。

trans-unit.source: The caller can display a message to the user if the designer cannot be reloaded.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端可以向使用者顯示訊息，如果無法重新載入設計工具。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the reload request is accepted; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the loader does not allow the reload.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已接受重新載入要求。<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果載入器不允許重新載入。
